Name: Empire Takeover
About the game: This is a fun & amazing tower crush game! Crush enemy's towers, take over the empire! ● Fight: Connect all your buildings together to grow them taller and then takeover the enemy's buildings. ● Control: Simple drag controls from one building to another. ● Build: Build your empire, occupy more territory, crush your opponents. ● Heroes: Recruit legendary heroes. ● Special art style: Lowpoly Style Game. ● 2 Special Mode: #1 Stage Maker Mode: design levels by yourself and share it to your family, your friends or all the worldwide players. #2 Offline Mode: play levels even you have no network. Good luck, I wish you will like this game!
